title: IRC Archive for channel #xwiki on 23 August 2014 - XWiki
content:
<evalica> has quit  
00:41 <DarkKnightCZ> has joined #xwiki  
01:10 <DarkKnightCZ> has quit  
01:28 <Enygma`1> has quit  
03:02 <momomomomo> has quit  
09:29 <evalica> has joined #xwiki  
09:30 <Enygma`> has joined #xwiki  
09:34 <DarkKnightCZ> has joined #xwiki  
10:00 <vmassol> has joined #xwiki  
13:49 <DarkKnightCZ> has quit  
15:41 <vmassol> has quit  
17:10 <evalica> has quit  
17:11 <vmassol> has joined #xwiki  
17:12 <vmassol> thanks sdumitriu for the cleanup :)  
17:12 <sdumitriu> You're welcome  
18:30 <Enygma`> has quit  
20:02 <Enygma`> has joined #xwiki  
21:14 <sdumitriu> vmassol: Hm, I just created a Jira component for the packager maven plugin  
21:15 <sdumitriu> Should I delete it and only use the "Development issue only" component?  
21:15 <vmassol> checking something  
21:15 <vmassol> you created: "Packager Maven Plugin (tool)"?  
21:15 <sdumitriu> Yes  
21:15 <vmassol> looks ok  
21:16 <vmassol> we already have the other 2 tools  
21:16 <sdumitriu> OK, good  
21:16 <vmassol> FTR I'm fixing http://ci.xwiki.org/job/xwiki-platform/5958/consoleFull  
21:17 <vmassol> where were located past issues about the packager plugin?  
21:17 <vmassol> we might want to move some if they're easy to move  
21:17 <sdumitriu> There was a component for it, but it got deleted at some point  
21:18 <vmassol> strange  
21:18 <vmassol> no  
21:18 <vmassol> the component you're referring to  
21:18 <vmassol> was used for several things  
21:19 <vmassol> it was initially for the packager import/export plugin  
21:19 <vmassol> s/plugin/stuff  
21:19 <sdumitriu> Right  
21:19 <vmassol> and some people used that component for the packager plugin too I think  
21:21 <vmassol> bbl  
21:21 <vmassol> has quit  
21:34 <sburjan> has quit
